trans-unit.target: TEXT_FESANV2018_00497_ANVENTRANCE00497_000_000<tab>If you wish to participate in the military exercises, you have come to the right place.
TEXT_FESANV2018_00497_ANVENTRANCE00497_000_010<tab>We're taking registrations for the military exercises over in Ul'dah. If you've a mind to participate, you need but say the word.
TEXT_FESANV2018_00497_ANVENTRANCE00497_000_020<tab>We are accepting registrations on the Immortal Flames' behalf for the military exercises in Ul'dah. Will you be joining the fray?
TEXT_FESANV2018_00497_ANVENTRANCE00497_000_030<tab>If you wish to register for the military exercises, I'm afraid I must disappoint. We require a little more experience of our participants.
TEXT_FESANV2018_00497_SYSTEM_000_031<tab>In order to access <var 28 ((ContentFinderCondition)) E8022A /var>, you must first unlock <var 28 ((ContentFinderCondition)) E8032A /var>.
TEXT_FESANV2018_00497_SYSTEM_000_032<tab>This can be done by making sufficient progress in the quest “It's Probably Pirates.”
